# Description

This is a new alpha feature with the first use case to evaluate new CDF
projects for upgrade.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e76ae32d-155f-4930-bf50-40d6b2db5a21)

Will extend it with writing to file and give more granular results as
well as more resources. But stopping for now to keep the PR small.

## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Added

- [alpha] New command `cdf profile`. Enabled with `profile = true` in
the [alpha_flags] of section `cdf.toml` .

## templates

No changes.
